text:
[Verse]
Dark clouds in the sky
Feel the raindrops falling
Barefoot on the sidewalk
Hear the thunder calling

[Verse 2]
Dancing through puddles
Spin around and around
Joy in every splash
Laughter the only sound

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel alive again
Wash away the pain
Let the rhythm reign

[Verse 3]
Under flashing lights
Nature’s own display
Forget the worries now
In this rainy ballet

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel alive again
Wash away the pain
Let the rhythm reign

[Bridge]
Lightning in the night
Hearts are beating fast
Together in the dance
Living free at last
title: Dancing in the Rain
